verbose_text: The results showed that sucralfate, n-acetylcysteine and, oil extract of curcimun, substances with antioxidant properties, in addition to reducing the degree of tissue inflammation, and the levels of lipids peroxidation, increase the content of both acidic mucin subtypes in the colonic mucosa without supply of SCFAs.
evidence: n-acetylcysteine and, oil extract of curcimun, substances with antioxidant properties, in addition to reducing the degree of tissue inflammation, and the levels of lipids peroxidation, increase the content of both acidic mucin
